name: Hide Noisy Metaboxes
author: Aaron Holbrook

sections.description: Hides noisy metaboxes from Dashboard for User 1. Generally used by Developers during site development, cuts down on load time and annoyances from dashboard widgets.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Done! Those annoying dashboard metaboxes will be turned off for User 1.
sections.changelog: 1.0.1 – Code cleanup and testing on 4.4.2 1.0 – Initial release
